entry.em: ..TORNADO WATCH 204 IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON

entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
